plot: Nick (David Giuntoli) and Hank (Russell Hornsby) investigate a dangerous female suspect (guest star Jacqueline Toboni) leaving a trail of Wesen in her wake. Elsewhere, Adalind (Claire Coffee) takes measures into her own hands, even if that means forging a dangerous alliance.—Anonymous

Nick's team wonders which feral species fatally fought off two tough tugs, soon concluding it must be a Grimm, as they track down a young female. Threats all around as Adalind blames Renard for having handed over the baby, wrongly assuming to royal family, where after henchman Weston Steward fails, king Frederick renders prince Victor liable with bis head to recover it, but before his trap snaps, Renard surprises her. Nick's suspect is identified as psychiatric runaway Teresa 'Trubel' Rubel, who ignores her species and heritage, so he assumes the mentor role.—KGF Vissers
